ygData.subject: Re: Greetings.....
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, there is no best place to hunt, but to find a place nearby and lvl up there. I myself, when i was 7, stayed in Blackburrow until 11 and then travelled to
ygData.messageBody:
Well, there is no best place to hunt, but to find
a place nearby and lvl up there. I myself, when i
was 7, stayed in Blackburrow until 11 and then
travelled to Butcherblock. Blackburrow is a good place i
guess, you can go from 1 to 19 there, but ya have to be
used to the newbies trains =) I face the same thing
from the experienced players in Sol B! Dungeons are
crazy, but very fun =) Good Luck and Happy
Hunting!<br><br>Gumdail Frozenfist of Povar<br>Barbarian Shaman lvl
35<br><br>P.S. Very nice web page =)
